mainBranchIssues.codeSnippet: A [`Response`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Response) can be returned from this hook to completely avoid making a HTTP request. This can be used to mock a request, check an internal cache, etc. An **important** consideration when returning a `Response` from this hook is that all the following hooks will be skipped, so **ensure you only return a `Response` from the last hook**.
codeContext: A [`Response`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Response) can be returned from this hook to completely avoid making a HTTP request. This can be used to mock a request, check an internal cache, etc. An **important** consideration when returning a `Response` from this hook is that all the following hooks will be skipped, so **ensure you only return a `Response` from the last hook**.

This can be used to mock a request, check an internal cache, etc. An **important** consideration when returning a `Response` from this hook is that all the following hooks will be skipped, so **ensure you only return a `Response` from the last hook**.
